title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library to pull, bundle and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain LLM interface that wraps Ollama, enabling Retrieval & Tool pipelines.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker ready).

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with model management, chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing typed APIs and async Tokio support for Ollama.

title: ollama/ollama-main
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package.

title: open-webui/open-webui
summary: Community fork of Ollama-WebUI adding plugins, admin panel & LDAP auth.

title: ollama-chat/ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using the ollama-js client and Vite.

title: ollama-helm/ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker/ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image sources and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-hass/ollama-hass
summary: Home-Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent.

title: ollama-discord/ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that queries local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack/ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into channels/DMs.

title: ollama-cli/ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive shell (REPL) for Ollama with history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-rag/ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-streamlit/ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that streams Ollama responses with token metrics.

title: ollama-npm/ollama-npm
summary: npm page showing weekly downloads and version history for ollama JS client.
